features.caption: SCALE
features.headline: It’s all happening in the channel
features.content: Follow along with everything related to individual topics, projects or teams in their dedicated channels.

features.caption: SCALE
features.headline: Work closer with other companies
features.content: Keep clients, vendors or partners in the loop by sharing a channel in Slack. Work moves faster when conversations do, too..

features.caption: SCALE
features.headline: History you can see and search
features.content: Projects end, teams change and Slack saves everything. Rather than trying to remember, easily find what you’re looking for.
